attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tonight, I watch News 24 and see that Morgan Tsvangirai has pulled out of Friday's presidential run-off because of all the violence against the Zimbabwe people and that the election will not be free and fair. I, for one, have had enough. Does there have to be oil in Zimbabwe to send in the troops. Protect the Zimbabwe people now. Give them a free and fair election.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=resign&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
